Package exengine.database

Class DatabaseService

java.lang.Object
exengine.database.DatabaseService
@Service public class DatabaseService extends Object
The DatabaseService class provides methods for interacting with the database to perform operations related to rules, errors, users, entities, and occurrences.

    • DatabaseService

      public DatabaseService()

  • Method Details

    • resetDatabase

      public void resetDatabase()
      Resets the database by deleting all rules, errors, users, and entities. If the application is in demo mode, it also deletes all occurrences.

    • findAllRules

      public List<Rule> findAllRules()
      Retrieves a list of all rules stored in the database.
      Returns:
      the list of all rules

    • saveNewRule

      public void saveNewRule(Rule rule)
      Saves a new rule to the database.
      Parameters:
      rule - the rule to be saved

    • deleteAllRules

      public void deleteAllRules()
      Deletes all rules from the database.

    • findRuleByName

      public Rule findRuleByName(String ruleName)
      Finds a rule in the database by its name.
      Parameters:
      ruleName - the name of the rule
      Returns:
      the rule object if found, or null otherwise

    • findAllErrors

      public List<Error> findAllErrors()
      Retrieves a list of all errors stored in the database.
      Returns:
      the list of all errors

    • saveNewError

      public void saveNewError(Error error)
      Saves a new error to the database.
      Parameters:
      error - the error to be saved

    • deleteAllErrors

      public void deleteAllErrors()
      Deletes all errors from the database.

    • saveNewUser

      public void saveNewUser(User user)
      Saves a new user to the database.
      Parameters:
      user - the user to be saved

    • deleteAllUsers

      public void deleteAllUsers()
      Deletes all users from the database.

    • findUserByUserId

      public User findUserByUserId(String userId)
      Finds a user in the database by their user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user ID
      Returns:
      the user object if found, or null otherwise

    • findOwnerByRuleName

      public User findOwnerByRuleName(String ruleName)
      Finds the owner of a rule by its name.
      Parameters:
      ruleName - the name of the rule
      Returns:
      the owner user object if found, or null otherwise

    • deleteAllEntities

      public void deleteAllEntities()
      Deletes all entities from the database.

    • saveNewEntity

      public void saveNewEntity(Entity entity)
      Saves a new entity to the database.
      Parameters:
      entity - the entity to be saved

    • findEntityIdsByDeviceName

      public ArrayList<String> findEntityIdsByDeviceName(String deviceName)
      Finds a list of entity IDs in the database by their device name.
      Parameters:
      deviceName - the device name
      Returns:
      the list of entity IDs with matching device names

    • deleteAllOccurrencies

      public void deleteAllOccurrencies()
      Deletes all occurrences from the database.

    • saveNewOccurrenceEntry

      public void saveNewOccurrenceEntry(OccurrenceEntry occurrenceEntry)
      Saves a new occurrence entry to the database.
      Parameters:
      occurrenceEntry - the occurrence entry to be saved

    • findOccurrenceEntriesByUserIdAndRuleId

      public ArrayList<OccurrenceEntry> findOccurrenceEntriesByUserIdAndRuleId(String userId, String ruleId)
      Finds occurrence entries in the database by user ID and rule ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user ID
      ruleId - the rule ID
      Returns:
      the list of occurrence entries with matching user ID and rule ID

    • getAllActions

      public ArrayList<LogEntry> getAllActions()
      Returns a list of unique actions combining the actions of all rules and errors stores in the database.
      Returns:
      A list of unique actions
